projects.title: GEMINI 2.0
projects.description: Unlock the power of Gemini in a whole new way! This user-friendly clone brings advanced AI to a familiar interface. Ask questions, explore information, and have engaging conversations - all at your fingertips.

projects.title: FLAVORO FOODIEEE
projects.description: Flavoro Foodieee: Your flavor adventure starts here! Discover delicious eats, explore menus, and order from your favorite restaurants - all in one app. It's like having a world of food at your fingertips.

projects.title: SHOE SHOP
projects.description: Find your perfect fit with our curated selection of footwear for every style and occasion. Browse, shop, and strut your stuff - all from the comfort of your home (or phone!).

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: Unleash a visual feast! Explore my curated video gallery. Dive into stunning visuals, captivating stories, and endless entertainment - all just a click away.

projects.title: TECHY STAR
projects.description: Launch into the future with TechyStar!  This app connects you with cutting-edge tech, news, and resources. Learn, explore, and level up your tech game - all in one place.

projects.title: PORTFOLIO
projects.description: I craft impactful experiences in Web Development. Explore my portfolio to see my skills in action through React js. Let's collaborate and bring your vision to life!
